org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins

Class HtmlLegendId

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.HtmlLegendId

  • final class HtmlLegendId
extends Object
    Utility to managed the id to apply to HTML element when a legend is created.
    There are 2 kinds of HTML element ids:
    • for color cell, the format is [chartId]_[datasetIndex]_[index]_color
    • for label cell, the format is [chartId]_[datasetIndex]_[index]_label
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • getIdForColumn

        private String getIdForColumn(boolean isColor)
        Returns the HTML element id for label or color cell.
        Parameters:
        isColor - if true, the HTML id will use COLOR_COLUMN_ID_TEMPLATE, otherwise LABEL_COLUMN_ID_TEMPLATE
        Returns:
        the HTML element id for label cell

      • lookForLegendItem

        LegendItem lookForLegendItem(List<LegendLabelItem> legendItems)
        Looks from a list of legend items which is related to the HTML legend id, checking the dataset and data indexes.
        Parameters:
        legendItems - list of legend items
        Returns:
        the legend item which matches with this HTMLlegend id or null if not found
